name: getCategoryDocs
description: Returns the docs and children docs within this category

slug.description: Slug of category. Slugs must be all lowercase, and replace spaces with hyphens. For example, for the the category "Getting Started", enter the slug "getting-started"

x-readme-version.description: Version number of your docs project, for example, v3.0. To see all valid versions for your docs project call https://docs.readme.com/developers/reference/version#getversions.
